moves.19... Bxa1 20. Rxa1 Rg8 21. Kh2: Why not grab the free pawn?  Oh, right, the bishop would take the h pawn.  I also like Qh7.
moves.23... O-O-O 24. Qxh5: I think I would have gone after the other one, saved the h pawn for the bishop.
moves.24... Ng5 25. Bg4 Kb8 26. f4 Ne4 27. Qxf: Now THAT seems like a questionable move.
Sweet.  Save the pawn push to when it will hurt.  Does black respond?
moves.35. Qd4 Rxe3+: 35 moves into the game white finally loses a pawn.
